about.title: My Professional Journey
about.history: I was born in Konya in 1981. I have completed the education process in Kırşehir until university examination. I have started English Medical education in Hacettepe University Medicine Faculty in 1998 and completed in 2006. At the same year I have started the Emergency Medicine residency program in Dışkapı Yıldırım Beyazıt Education and Training Hospital and completed in 2011. In 2014, I have received the title of Assoc.Prof.Dr. In 2015, I worked as the educational and administrative chief officer of the department of emergency medicine in Bağcılar Education and Research Hospital. Between October 2016-December 2017 I worked at Acıbadem Eskişehir Hospital as Emergency Physician. At January 2018 I started to work at Memorial Ataşehir Hospital as Emergency Physician and Vice Managing Director; 2 years as Managing Director, between July 2019-August 2021. I was working at emergency department as Emergency Physician also during I was working as Managing Director. Since July 2022, I have been working as Emergency Physician at Acıbadem Ataşehir Hospital and I am still continuing.
